div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

strong.style: letter-spacing: normal; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: medium;

span.style: letter-spacing: normal; font-size: medium; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: is one of the geographically largest school districts in the Chicago Metropolitan Area. The village of Peotone is located 43 miles (69 km) south of Chicago, Illinois.

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;

span.br: Peotone CUSD 207U serves students from the south, central and eastern region of Will County, and a small portion of northwestern Kankakee County. This includes Green Garden, Manhattan, Peotone, Rockville, Will and Wilton townships.

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: Peotone CUSD 207U is comprised of five school buildings:

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: ~ The Connor Shaw Center – District Office and Preschool Program

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: ~ Peotone Elementary School – Kindergarten through Third Grade

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: ~ Peotone Intermediate Center – Fourth and Fifth Grade

p.style: margin-top: 0.5em; margin-bottom: 0.9em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: normal;
p.span: ~ Peotone Junior High School – Sixth through Eighth Grade
~ Peotone High School – Ninth through Twelfth Grade
